Effect.en: You can target 1 Continuous Spell/Trap you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, halve the ATK of 2 face-up monsters on the field until the end of this turn. If a card(s) your opponent controls is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 "Senka" card in your GY, except "Senka Schemer - Jia Wen"; add it to your hand. You can only use each efffect of "Senka Schemer - Jia Wen" once per turn.

en: Send 1 card to the GY and halve ATK
